mapper.select: SELECT lh, jdwz, (TO_DAYS(DATE(sgfssj))-TO_DAYS('2006-01-01')) as time FROM ybsg1 where lh = #{set} AND jdwz IS NOT NULL AND sgfssj IS NOT NULL and YEAR(sgfssj) >= #{starty} and YEAR(sgfssj) <= #{endy} ORDER BY jdwz

SELECT A.id, A.diff from ( SELECT @id:=@id+1 as id,lh,DATE(sgfssj) as time,DATEDIFF(DATE(sgfssj),@prev_time) as diff, (@prev_time:=DATE(sgfssj)) FROM (SELECT lh,sgfssj from ybsg1 WHERE lh= #{set} ORDER BY sgfssj) as T, (SELECT @id:=0) as B, (SELECT @prev_time:='2016-01-01') as C ) as A WHERE diff >= 0
